Sql.query: insert into ind_periodocuadro( percuacodi, percuatiporigen, percuafecini, percuafecfin, percuausumodificacion, percuafecmodificacion, percuaflagpotaseg, descucodi, percua3factork, cuadr3codi, percuaanno, percuames ) values( :percuacodi, :percuatiporigen, :percuafecini, :percuafecfin, :percuausumodificacion, :percuafecmodificacion, :percuaflagpotaseg, :descucodi, :percua3factork, :cuadr3codi, :percuaanno, :percuames )

update ind_periodocuadro set percuatiporigen = :percuatiporigen, percuafecini = :percuafecini, percuafecfin = :percuafecfin, percuausumodificacion = :percuausumodificacion, percuafecmodificacion = :percuafecmodificacion, percuaflagpotaseg = :percuaflagpotaseg, descucodi = :descucodi, percua3factork = :percua3factork, cuadr3codi = :cuadr3codi, percuaanno = :percuaanno, percuames = :percuames, percuaextension = :percuaextension where percuacodi = :percuacodi
select * from ind_periodocuadro where percuafecini = to_date('{0}', 'YYYY-MM-DD') and percuafecfin = to_date('{1}', 'YYYY-MM-DD') and DESCUCODI in ({2})
select * from ind_periodocuadro where percuafecini = to_date('{0}', 'YYYY-MM-DD') and percuafecfin = to_date('{1}', 'YYYY-MM-DD') and percuatiporigen is null
SELECT * FROM IND_PERIODOCUADRO WHERE DESCUCODI = 2 AND PERCUATIPORIGEN = '{0}' AND PERCUAFECINI >= TO_DATE ('{1}','DD/MM/YYYY') AND PERCUAFECFIN <= TO_DATE ('{2}','DD/MM/YYYY')
SELECT * FROM IND_PERIODOCUADRO WHERE DESCUCODI = '{2}' AND PERCUAFECINI >= TO_DATE ('{0}','DD/MM/YYYY') AND PERCUAFECFIN <= TO_DATE ('{1}','DD/MM/YYYY')
SELECT * FROM IND_PERIODOCUADRO WHERE DESCUCODI = 5 AND PERCUATIPORIGEN = '{0}' AND PERCUAFECINI >= TO_DATE ('{1}','DD/MM/YYYY') AND PERCUAFECFIN <= TO_DATE ('{2}','DD/MM/YYYY')
select * from ind_periodocuadro where PERCUAMES <> 0 and PERCUAANNO <> 0 and to_date(to_char(PERCUAANNO) || '- '|| to_char(PERCUAMES),'yyyy-MM') = to_date('{0}','yyyy-MM')
